00034 RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuBase::gsMainMenuBase(){
00035   LOGI("Constructing a  gsMainMenuBase");
00036   velocity=NULL;

00042 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuBase::init(){
00043   LOGI("Initialising gsMainMenuBase");
00044   yBorder=1.1f;
00045   yBorderFrom=0.0f;
00046   yBorderTo=0.0f;
00047 
00048   initFrameNumber=3;
00049   initFrameCount=0;
00050 
00051   inTransition=false;
00052 
00053   // if yBorder=0.0f, u=1.0, v=0.7
00054   uMappingScreenSize=0.5f;
00055   vMappingScreenSize=0.7f;
00056 
00057   mRoot=GameEngine::getSingleton().getOgreRoot();
00058   mSceneMgr=GameEngine::getSingleton().getOgreSceneMgr();
00059 
00060   menuNode = mSceneMgr->getRootSceneNode()
00061     ->createChildSceneNode("Menu");
00062 
00063   translateTo(0.0);
00064 
00065   drawMenuBackground();
00066   drawDynamicBackground();
00067   drawBorder();
00068   setCorners();
00069   isInit=true;
00070 }
00071 
00075 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuBase::cleanup(){
00076   if (velocity){
00077     delete velocity;
00078     velocity=NULL;
00079   }
00080 }

00107 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuBase::drawBorder(){
00108   LOGI("Draw border");
00109 
00110   // Create background material
00111   MaterialPtr material = MaterialManager::getSingleton().create("Border", "General");
00112   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->createTextureUnitState("border.jpg");
00113   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setDepthCheckEnabled(false);
00114   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setDepthWriteEnabled(false);
00115   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setLightingEnabled(false);
00116   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(0)
00117     ->setTextureScale(1.0f, 0.25f);
00118   
00119   // Create background rectangle covering the whole screen
00120   bordRect = new Rectangle2D(true);
00121   //rect->setCorners(-1.0, 1.0, 1.0, -1.0);
00122   bordRect->setCorners(yBorder-0.05f, 1.0, yBorder+0.05f, -1.0);
00123   bordRect->setMaterial("Border");
00124   
00125   bordRect->setBoundingBox(AxisAlignedBox(-100000.0*Vector3::UNIT_SCALE, 
00126                                       100000.0*Vector3::UNIT_SCALE));
00127   
00128   // Attach background to the scene
00129   SceneNode* node = menuNode->createChildSceneNode("Border");
00130   node->attachObject(bordRect);
00131 }

00136 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuBase::drawMenuBackground(){
00137   LOGI("Draw MenuBackground");
00138 
00139   // Create background material
00140   MaterialPtr material = MaterialManager::getSingleton()
00141     .create("StaticBackground", "General");
00142   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)
00143     ->createTextureUnitState("staticmenu.jpg");
00144   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setDepthCheckEnabled(false);
00145   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setDepthWriteEnabled(false);
00146   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setLightingEnabled(false);
00147   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(0)
00148     ->setTextureScale(uMappingScreenSize, vMappingScreenSize);
00149   
00150   menuRect = new Rectangle2D(true);
00151   menuRect->setMaterial("StaticBackground");
00152   
00153   menuRect->setBoundingBox(AxisAlignedBox(-100000.0*Vector3::UNIT_SCALE, 
00154                                       100000.0*Vector3::UNIT_SCALE));
00155   
00156   // Attach background to the scene
00157   SceneNode* node = menuNode->createChildSceneNode("StaticBackground");
00158   node->attachObject(menuRect);
00159 }

00164 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuBase::drawDynamicBackground(){
00165   LOGI("Draw DynamicBackground");
00166 
00167   // Create background material
00168   MaterialPtr material = MaterialManager::getSingleton().create("DynamicBackground", "General");
00169   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->createTextureUnitState("dynamicmenu.jpg");
00170   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setDepthCheckEnabled(false);
00171   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setDepthWriteEnabled(false);
00172   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->setLightingEnabled(false);
00173   material->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(0)
00174     ->setTextureScale(uMappingScreenSize, vMappingScreenSize);
00175   
00176   // Create background rectangle covering the whole screen
00177   dynaRect = new Rectangle2D(true);
00178   dynaRect->setMaterial("DynamicBackground");
00179   
00180   dynaRect->setBoundingBox(AxisAlignedBox(-100000.0*Vector3::UNIT_SCALE, 
00181                                       100000.0*Vector3::UNIT_SCALE));
00182   
00183   // Attach background to the scene
00184   SceneNode* node = menuNode->createChildSceneNode("DynamicBackground");
00185   node->attachObject(dynaRect);
00186 }

00200 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuBase::transition(){
00201   if (inTransition){
00202     if (velocity){
00203       // Engine initialization
00204       if (initFrameCount<initFrameNumber){
00205         initFrameCount++;
00206         velocity->reset();
00207       }
00208       else{
00209         yBorder-=  velocity->getNextFrame(inTransition);
00210       }
00211 
00212       // If the transition is ended
00213       if (!inTransition){
00214         LOGI("Transition ended");
00215         yBorder=yBorderTo;
00216         GuiManager::getSingleton().beginGuiFadeIn();
00217       }
00218     }
00219     else{
00220       LOGW("Cannot get translation value, VelocityCalculator pointer is NULL");
00221     }
00222     setCorners();
00223   }
00224 }
00225 
00229 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuBase::setCorners(){
00230   bordRect->setCorners(yBorder-0.05f, 1.0, yBorder+0.05f, -1.0);
00231   dynaRect->setCorners(yBorder-2.10f, 1.0, yBorder-0.05f, -1.0);
00232   menuRect->setCorners(yBorder+0.05f, 1.0, yBorder+2.05f, -1.0);
00233 
00234 }
00235 
00241 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuBase::translateTo(float f){
00242   LOGI("Setting gsMainMenuBase translation");
00243   inTransition=true;
00244   yBorderFrom=yBorder;
00245   yBorderTo=f;
00246 
00247   if (velocity){
00248     velocity->setTranslationLenght(getTranslationLenght(yBorderFrom, 
00249                                                         yBorderTo));
00250     velocity->start();
00251   }
00252   else{
00253     LOGW("Cannot start VelocityCalculator, pointer is NULL");
00254   }
00255 
00256 }
00257 
00265 bool RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuBase::isInTransition(){
00266   return this->inTransition;
00267 }
00268 
00282 float RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuBase::getTranslationLenght(float from, 
00283                                                              float to){
00284 
00285   float ret=0.0f;
00286 
00287   if (from>=0.0f && to>=0.0f){
00288     ret=from-to;
00289   }
00290   else if (from>=0.0f && to<0.0f){
00291     ret=from;
00292     ret-=to;
00293   }
00294   else{
00295     LOGW("getTranslationLenght's case not implemented");
00296   }
00297   LOGI("getTranslationLenght debug :");
00298   LOGCATS("From :");
00299   LOGCATF(from);
00300   LOGCATS(" To :");
00301   LOGCATF(to);
00302   LOGCATS(" ret= ");
00303   LOGCATF(ret);
00304   LOGCAT();
00305 
00306   return ret;
00307 }

00316 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuBase::frameStarted(const FrameEvent& evt){
00317 
00318 
00319   if (isInTransition())
00320     transition();
00321 
00322 }
